attributes.action: General public vote of no confidence in Jeremy Hunt as health secretary.
attributes.background: Jeremy Hunt MP has recently proposed changes to Junior Doctors contracts which would put patients lives at risk, insulted Paramedics as mere Ambulance drivers and much more. We need an MP who is in touch with the real NHS lets try for a vote of no confidence and ask for a new secrerary of health.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be asking for action from the general public, not the Government or the House of Commons.

If you would like the House of Commons to consider a motion of no confidence in the Health Secretary, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121152
